actions.text: On agreeing to the Hutchinson amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment makes it unlawful to transfer any firearm to a juvenile if the transferor has reason to believe it will be used in a school zone or in a serious violent felony.
purpose: An amendment no. 14 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to make it unlawful to transfer any firearm to a juvenile if the transferor has reason to believe it will be used in a school zone or in a serious violent felony.
